content.rendered:
On Atomic Wallet Report in December, it was crucial for Atomic wallet. We reached the point of seeing the yearly accomplishments and making some resolutions for the future. Check it out!

What is done: 

  1. Non-Custodial Staking for Tezos, Cosmos, Tron, Komodo & other assets
  2. New Desktop  
  3. New Mobile
  4. Roadmap 2020
  5. AMA Sessions
  6. Support Work in December
  7. Membership Program

Staking in Atomic

By the end of 2019, staking for multiple assets such as Tezos, Cosmos, Tron, Komodo, Ontology/Gas, and others has become available in Atomic wallet. 

The main quality of staking is non-custody. The wallet provides zero-fee service to users, who choose validators by themselves and get the rewards directly from the validators. Besides that, such staking guarantees support for the network’s decentralization.

Download Atomic and start staking your favorite assets. 

Desktop Releases (2.11.0-2.12.0)

Our new desktop version has these features:

  • Staking for XTZ, ATOM, TRX, KMD, ONT/ONG, NEO/GAS, ALGO, VET/VTHO, BTT, WINk.
  • Tezos custom bakers – delegate XTZ to any baker you like.
  • Support for .crypto human-readable domains.
  • Improved sending for large UTXO transactions, especially for miners.
  • Bug fixes for Cash back rewards calculation, AE history & balance.

You can download Atomic here.

Atomic Mobile App

What’s new in the 0.53.0–.53.2 Android & iOS versions:

  • Staking for XTZ, ATOM, TRX, KMD, ONT/ONG, NEO/GAS, ALGO, VET/VTHO, BTT, WINk.
  • Added support for .crypto human-readable domains.
  • Improved sending for large UTXO transactions, especially for miners.
  • ‘Tools’ menu moved to the screen ‘wallet’.
  • Bug fixes for Membership rewards calculation, AE balance & history.

Get the new Atomic Mobile for iOS or Android here.

Roadmap 2020

Our roadmap is the summary of what was accomplished by Atomic wallet team in 2019 and the plans for 2020. Take a read here! 

AMAs in December

Atomic Wallet hosted a few AMA sessions in our Telegram chat this month. Our community was introduced to these projects: Kambria, Everstake, MakerDAO, and ChangeNOW. You’re welcome to read our digests:

Kambria

Everstake

MakerDAO

ChangeNOW

Support Work in December

In December, our support team reacted to 1772 issues in 21 minutes on average. We’re constantly getting reviews on the service, and happily improving it day by day. In case of any problem, reach us by email or live chat widget on our website. Atomic support service works for you 24/7. 

Atomic Wallet Cash Back Program

Do you know if you use instant exchange in Atomic Wallet, you can get cash back – up to 1% every month? In December, we have fixed our calculation for the rewards. Just hold a certain amount of AWC token on your wallet. Find out more about the Membership and join the program!

We’re happy to work on Atomic Wallet for you! Be always aware of our news and updates with Twitter, Telegram, Facebook, and Reddit.
